text: John Zorn (born September 2, 1953 in New York City, New York, United statesAllmusic biography Online) is an American avant-garde composer, arranger, record producer, saxophonist and multi-instrumentalist. He is collaborated with Lou Reed, Weird Little Boy, Laurie Anderson and others. ==References== Category:American composers Category:Musicians from New York City Category:1953 births Category:Living people
title: John Zorn
